entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Infinite loop on Windows for new TimePicker event, TimeSelected #26415
  • Get C# Stack trace of MAUI iOS without using any CrashAnalytics #26414
  • Windows on ARM: Template is not functional #26408
  • Blazor MAUI with Strapi <a> iOS 18 issue #26405
    Backlog
  • Blazor Hybrid and Web app without Identity #26407
    Backlog
  • [IOS, Mac]Inconsistent Resize Behavior for Header/Footer #26397
    Backlog
  • Setting `Window.TitleBar` to `null` does not remove the customization #26396
    Backlog
  • [IOS]Footer not displaying in iOS when StackOrientation.Horizontal is set on FlyoutFooter #26395
    Backlog
  • [Android] Click on flyout clicks on page behind #26392
    Backlog
  • [WINDOWS]Dynamically Added FlyoutItems During Navigation Not Displayed on Windows #26391
    Backlog
  • The LeadingContent of the TitleBar appears before the App Info section. #26378
    Backlog
  • [Windows] ListView incorrect grouped collection range removal #26377

Closed

  • Build failed in Release with exit code 139 #26369
    .NET 9 SR2
  • Connectivity NETWORK_CAPABILITIES_CHANGED causing SIGSEGV Segfault? #25446
  • Use of Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Xaml.StaticExtension generates warnings #26372
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Build errors in Visual Studio 2022 when building a Maui app using Microsoft.Maui.Controls v9.0.12 and same version of Compatibility #26398
  • [Windows] Setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #18937
    Backlog
  • Maui CarousselView is still no sizing correct in iOS #26389
  • Net 9 Android - StatusBar Color overriden on modal pages #26388
  • System.InvalidCastException when using a custom map handler on iOS and .NET 9. #26000
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Maps crash when IsShowingUser = true in Release mode (iOS, NET 9 rc2) #25762
    Backlog
  • Collection view with horizontal grid layout has extra space on right (end) of collection #25433
    Backlog
  • No background color on Flyout navigation bar #25737
  • Unable to build and run an Android .NET 7 application with the latest MAUI .NET 9 / Visual Studio 17.12 installed #25845
  • Entry ReturnType="Next" doesn't work with SfTextInputLayout #26383
  • Specify Front or Back Camera - MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync() #26371
  • Unable to make UICalendarSelectionSingleDateDelegate working on iOS 17.5 in my handler #24074

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows][ Add correct menu bar item foreground resource override #26413
  • Set up MauiGResources for Localization #26412
    area-localization, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Change the yaml to build PR if lcl files were changed #26411
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10663811 #26410
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.2 to 1.0.3 #26406
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 35 #26404
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 34 #26403
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 33 #26402
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed MenuBarItem Foreground not updated #26401
    community ✨
  • [XC] Of course valuetype can implement interfaces #26400
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed CheckBox enabled color is not updated properly #26399
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for ListView ScrollTo Method throws NullReferenceException #26385
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed picker allows user input if the keyboard is visible #26382
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 32 #26380
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 31 #26379
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CV - Reset ScrollOffset when item source changes #26376
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2

Merged

  • [main] Rebase of 26174 - Localization Updates #26309
    area-templates, area-localization, .NET 9 SR2
  • [XC] SetValue on nullable BP types #26387
    .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 16 #26029
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Add RequireService to StaticExtension #26390
    area-xaml, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 17 #26081
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 27 #26333
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 23 #26219
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView with horizontal grid layout has extra space on right end #25825
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨

Updated

  • [iOS] [Mac] Fix for Gradient background size is incorrect when invalidating parent #26222
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
    area-single-project, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix deselect item on CollectionView #26315
    area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
  • [iOS] [Android] Fix for Shell custom FlyoutIcon display problem #26016
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 28 #26364
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Make Style nullable #25230
    community ✨
  • Fixed [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25919
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for TableView cells become empty after adding a new cell with context actions #26326
    community ✨
  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Fixed [Windows] TabbedPage current page indicator can be wrong #26202
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fix for Picker ItemsSource changed case exception: Value does not fall within the expected range #26325
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • 25534- Fix for Application crash on setting icon on toolbar item #26126
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fixed the RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand not firing issue in CollectionView #26067
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [XC] Add support for DoesNotInheritDataTypeAttribute to XamlC #26359
  • [iOS] Fixed HeaderFooterGrid to pass on CV1 and CV2 #26022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 14 #25989
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` #26161
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 29 #26365
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 30 #26367
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the double tap editor freeze issue and added test cases #26203
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #25852
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] Add templated cells as children of the CollectionView2 #26357
    t/bug, area-controls-collectionview, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR2
